bundle_signin.agree_or_disagree: Choose whether you agree or disagree:
bundle_signin.no_worries: No worries! We’ll send instructions on how to reset your Visa Checkout account password
bundle_signin.on_its_way: Your email is on its way.
bundle_signin.to_reset: To reset your password, simply follow the instructions in the email.

tac.disagree_extended: __NOTAGREE__ and I will be signed out of my account.
tac.header: We've updated our terms and policies.

content.p_1: We are constantly improving the Visa Checkout experience. To continue to enjoy the benefits of Visa Checkout, a safe, simple and easy way to check out online, you must accept the updated __TERMS__ and __PRIVACY__.
content.p_2: Please take a moment to review the __HIGHLIGHTS__.
content.p_3: Please contact us if there's anything we can do to help or if you have questions about the updates. You can get in touch with us by sending an email to __SUPPORTEMAIL__. Our Visa Checkout support center is open 24 hours, 365 days a year.
content.p_4: If you would like to close your account follow the instructions in the __SUPPORT__ page.
content.p_5: Check the "I agree" box below to continue using Visa Checkout. Thank you for being a part of our global service.

form.disagree_extended: __NOTAGREE__ and I will be signed out of my account.
